text: neohui jasindeul-eul huisaenghala tto neun neohui geojujileul tteonalago hana nim-i ideul wiseonjadeul-ege myeonglyeong haess eul ttae geudeul-eun sosuleul je-oehagoneun geuleohge haenghaji anihaessdeola man-il geudeul-i chung-go bad-eundaelo haenghayeossdamyeon geugeos-eun geudeul-ege deoug joh-ass-eulila ttohan geudeul-ui sin-ang-i deoug chungmanhaess eulila
